qas.question: Which Egyptian goddess do some scholars ascribe similarities to?
What type of goddess is Isis?
What kind of relationship do some scholars believe exists between Isis and Mary?
What is the name of the goddess that the Virgin Mary met in Egypt?
Who is considered to be a sister of the Egyptian goddess Isis?
What is the relationship between Jesus and the Egyptian goddess Isis?
What is the name of the cult that some scholars subscribe to?

context: The adoption of the mother of Jesus as a virtual goddess may represent a reintroduction of aspects of the worship of Isis. "When looking at images of the <a1_0>Egyptian<a1_0/> goddess <a0_0><b3_0>Isis<b3_0/><a0_0/> and those of <b4_0>the Virgin Mary<b4_0/>, one may initially observe iconographic similarities. These parallels have led many scholars to suggest that there is a distinct <a2_0><b5_0>iconographic<b5_0/><a2_0/> relationship between Isis and Mary. In fact, some scholars have gone even further, and have suggested, on the basis of this relationship, a direct link between <b6_0>the cult of Mary<b6_0/> and that of Isis."
